name: libwebcam
short_description:
The webcam-tools package contains the following two components:
- libwebcam    Webcam Library (LGPL)
- uvcdynctrl     Manage dynamic controls in uvcvideo (GPL)

This  project was first developed by logitech and it was hosted at a svn repo in the quickcamteam site, but since then logitech shutdown the site.
So now after getting the OK with the developer Martin Rubli, we migrated the code to sourceforge.
